title: How to transfer a model trained with pytorch 0.3.1.post2 to pytorch 0.2.0_3 when using torch.load()?
body_html:
I have trained a model with pytorch 0.3.1.post2, but I want to use it in pytorch 0.2.0_3 with torch.load(). However, I came to UnicodeEncodeError: 'ascii' codec can't encode character '\u03b3' in position 27: ordinal not in range(128). Has the serialization method using pickle changed from 0.2.0_3 to 0.3.1.post2?
What should I do to deal with it without retraining a new model using 0.2.0_3?
Thank you very much!
body_text:

body:
I have trained a model with pytorch 0.3.1.post2, but I want to use it in pytorch 0.2.0_3 with `torch.load()`. However, I came to `UnicodeEncodeError: 'ascii' codec can't encode character '\u03b3' in position 27: ordinal not in range(128)`. Has the serialization method using pickle changed from 0.2.0_3 to 0.3.1.post2?
What should I do to deal with it without retraining a new model using 0.2.0_3?
Thank you very much!
